description: One by one, the rest of the Suzaku Seven are found, but as they are, they may not be enough to face the new threat which threatens to destroy not only the Konan empire but the entire world of the book! It is becoming clearer and clearer that there is a mysterious power pulling the strings behind Konan`s push to the brink of destruction, and Mayo appears to be the key to unlocking its full, evil power. Keisuke, Yui, and Mayo`s friend Saori desperately attempt to pull Mayo back before her pain and anger destroy them all.
